h1_title: Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind
content: Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind at Yoaguai Chiefs you'll go up against in Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. The pair of heads will attack using fire, and are the last bosses you'll fight as part of the Woods of Ember pathway.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Quick_as_Fire,_Fast_as_Wind.md', within the main section titled 'Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind'.
The content is as follows:
Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind at Yoaguai Chiefs you'll go up against in Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. The pair of heads will attack using fire, and are the last bosses you'll fight as part of the Woods of Ember pathway.
